Awkward.name: Awkward

starts.title: Both players make silly faces at each other
starts.extra: Also, make strange noises

starts.title: Both players maintain 10 seconds of eye contact
starts.extra: ... with your foreheads almost touching

examples.title: Maintain eye contact for 30 seconds
examples.extra: Do it without smiling and inch closer until your noses nearly touch

examples.title: Give each other an awkward compliment
examples.extra: Deliver it in a formal monotone while maintaining eye contact

examples.title: Shake hands for 15 seconds
examples.extra: Switch to an overly formal two‑handed handshake and hold it for 10 more seconds

suggestions: Pretend you just met on a bad date

Creative.name: Creative

starts.title: Start a sentence for the other player to finish
starts.extra: Also, make the sentence rhyme

starts.title: Pretend you are a mirror image of the other player
starts.extra: ... while the other player dances

examples.title: Improvise a 2‑line poem
examples.extra: Perform it as a dramatic whisper duet facing each other

examples.title: Invent a 5‑second handshake
examples.extra: Add one synchronized silly sound effect at the end

examples.title: Draw a picture in the air
examples.extra: Let the other trace it on your back with a fingertip

suggestions: Draw a picture of each other in the air

starts.title: Both players shake hands with each other
starts.extra: ... warmly, using both hands and eye contact

starts.title: Give each other a side-hug
starts.extra: Also, hold it 20 seconds and synch breathing

examples.title: Side‑hug for 10 seconds
examples.extra: Make it 30 seconds while synchronizing your breathing

examples.title: Hold hands for a minute
examples.extra: Lean heads together while holding hands

examples.title: Give each other a shoulder squeeze
examples.extra: Follow with a slow 5‑count back pat

starts.title: Both players wink at each other dramatically
starts.extra: Also, compliment each other

starts.title: Both players take off their shoes
starts.extra: Also, invent a wacky handshake with your feet

examples.title: Speak a bold compliment
examples.extra: Lean in and whisper it directly in their ear

examples.title: Strike a confident pose together
examples.extra: Hold it while making eye contact for 10 seconds

examples.title: Tell a flirty joke
examples.extra: Deliver a second joke from a step closer

Disgusting.name: Disgusting

starts.title: Both players make yucky faces at each other
starts.extra: Also, make gross, nasty noises

starts.title: Both players touch their foreheads to the floor
starts.extra: ... and also sniff the floor

examples.title: Describe a gross food memory
examples.extra: Act it out with exaggerated sound effects

examples.title: Pretend to sniff something stinky
examples.extra: Agree on the source and 'find it' together

examples.title: Make a yucky face
examples.extra: Hold it for a photo‑worthy 10 seconds

suggestions: Name the worst smell you know

starts.title: Both players stretch as high as they can
starts.extra: ... while jumping as high as they can

starts.title: The larger player will try to pick up the smaller
starts.extra: ... and carry them around the room

examples.title: Wall‑sit side‑by‑side for 20 seconds
examples.extra: Extend to 40 seconds if you can

examples.title: Do 10 jumping jacks together
examples.extra: Add 5 more in slow motion

examples.title: Plank and high‑five
examples.extra: Alternate left and right for 6 high‑fives total

starts.title: Both players stare at each other disdainfully
starts.extra: Also, criticize each other's appearance

starts.title: Both players disclose something embarrassing
starts.extra: Also, mock the other player's disclosure

examples.title: Tell your most cringe story
examples.extra: Re‑enact one moment of it with exaggerated drama

examples.title: Attempt a bad impression
examples.extra: Perform it as a 10‑second monologue

examples.title: Sing off‑key on purpose
examples.extra: Finish with a theatrical bow

Inedible.name: Inedible

starts.title: Both players choose a mild spice/sauce to taste
starts.extra: Choose something spicy or gross

starts.title: Both taste a random food from the fridge
starts.extra: Choose for each other

examples.title: Taste a harmless sauce
examples.extra: Mix in a mystery (safe) ingredient chosen by them

examples.title: Blindfold taste test (safe items)
examples.extra: Guess the ingredient; wrong guess means one more try

examples.title: Pretend to be food critics
examples.extra: Give each other a star rating and a snobby quote

suggestions: Create a menu of cursed dishes

starts.title: Both players disclose a hope, dream, or flaw
starts.extra: ... Make it something secret or embarrassing

starts.title: Maintain eye contact for ten seconds
starts.extra: Also, try to synchronize your breathing

examples.title: Hold hands and breathe together
examples.extra: Synchronize your breathing for 30 seconds

examples.title: Whisper a compliment
examples.extra: Add a second compliment about something non‑physical

examples.title: Maintain eye contact for 10 seconds
examples.extra: Try for 20 without laughing

starts.title: Both players make silly faces at each other
starts.extra: Also, make immature noises

starts.title: Both players look up each other's noses
starts.extra: Also, describe boogers like an avid archeologist

examples.title: Tell a fart joke
examples.extra: Add a homemade sound effect on the punchline

examples.title: Speak only in kid voices
examples.extra: Introduce yourselves like it's the first day of school

examples.title: Pretend the floor is lava
examples.extra: Get both feet on a 'safe island' together

starts.title: Both players describe a kink they have heard of
starts.extra: Both players disclose a kink they have

starts.title: Both players swat themselves
starts.extra: Both players gently swat each other

examples.title: Describe a playful boundary
examples.extra: Practice saying 'green / yellow / red' together

examples.title: Define a safe word
examples.extra: Each use it once in a pretend scene title

examples.title: Compliment a favorite body part
examples.extra: Add one respectful reason why you like it

Messy.name: Messy

starts.title: Both players muss up their own hair
starts.extra: Muss up each other's hair

starts.title: Both players smear food around their mouths
starts.extra: Help each other apply the food

examples.title: Make a shaving‑cream or ketchup mustache
examples.extra: Let the other add a matching dot on your cheek

examples.title: Muss up your hair
examples.extra: Let the other give it one playful ruffle

examples.title: Stack napkins as costumes
examples.extra: Walk a mini runway together

suggestions: Wear a silly hat you make now

starts.title: Toss a piece of food into the other player's mouth
starts.extra: If it falls on the floor, thrower has to eat it

starts.title: Balance a cup of water on each other's head
starts.extra: ... Make it a cup of milk or soda

examples.title: Do a trust lean
examples.extra: Close your eyes for a 3‑count lean

examples.title: Balance a book while dancing
examples.extra: Trade places without dropping it

examples.title: Flip a coin and obey
examples.extra: Loser follows one more silly instruction from the winner

Sensual.name: Sensual

starts.extra: Also, compliment each other's appearance

starts.title: Both players take off shoes (keep them off)
starts.extra: Also, play footsie with each other

examples.title: Trace a heart on the other's palm
examples.extra: Repeat on the forearm while making eye contact

examples.title: Exchange gentle compliments
examples.extra: Add a specific detail you noticed today

examples.title: Synchronize slow movements
examples.extra: Stand a little closer and sync for 20 seconds

suggestions: Trace a heart on the other's palm

starts.title: Both players make faces at each other
starts.extra: ... while babbling incoherently

starts.title: Both players make up a bizarre dance
starts.extra: ... while chanting each other's name

examples.extra: Add interpretive dance to express your point

examples.title: Invent a new animal sound
